text:
Hi there, not sure if this is the correct channel, but I am creating a custom template with a survey on it. You can see it here: <https://connect.fairbanksurology.com/?hs_preview=vbmNcyHc-29649132740>

I'm looking to email results to the user taking the survey. An email does send after completing the survey, but I'm looking to average the submissions and give a "score" based on the user's selections.

Does anyone have suggestions regarding how I might do this?
